57994|GECCO|2007|Particle swarm guided evolution strategy|Evolution strategy (ES) and particle swarm optimization (PSO) are two of the most popular research topics for tackling real-parameter optimization problems in evolutionary computation. 80710|VLDB|2006|Efficient Secure Query Evaluation over Encrypted XML Databases|Motivated by the "database-as-service" paradigm wherein data owned by a client is hosted on a third-party server, there is significant interest in secure query evaluation over encrypted databases.
